title: Is Kerry Wyatt leaving Emmerdale?
text:
Kerry falls and hits her head hard after a confrontation with Tracey (Picture: ITV).

Kerry Wyatt (Laura Norton) and Amy Wyatt (Natalie Ann Jamieson) have found themselves in a difficult situation in Emmerdale after causing the death of Frank Clayton (Michael Praed) and have been working to cover up the truth that they had started the fire that killed him.

Tracy Metcalfe (Amy Walsh) has been on a mission ever since to prove that her dad Frank wasn’t involved in the fire and things come to a head this week as viewers will see her confront Kerry – with dramatic results!

Kerry Wyatt’s life will be left hanging in the balance and viewers are questioning whether this is it for the character and if Kerry will actually leaving Emmerdale.

Is Kerry Wyatt leaving Emmerdale?

In tomorrow night’s episode of Emmerdale, viewers will see Kerry suffer a fall that leaves her hospitalised. It appears that when she falls and hits her head, she suffers potentially fatal injuries and viewers will also see Kerry flat-line in hospital while Amy watchers on in horror.

Advertisement

Advertisement

As a crash team struggle to revive Kerry, a devastated Amy can do nothing but watch as their efforts fail on the first attempt.

Actress Natalie Ann, who plays Kerry’s daughter in the ITV soap, exclusively told Metro.co.uk: ‘Tracy pushes Kerry and she ends up hitting her head, which changes everything. She’s in a really bad way – and suddenly, for Amy, she wishes that Tracy had just gone to the police. Before, she was just worried about being reported but that’s suddenly the better option because she could lose her mum now. She’s in bits and in a real panic.

‘Kerry is really badly hurt and it’s touch and go, so obviously now, there’s not just the secret about the fire in the mix.

‘Everyone here has made serious mistakes, and everyone could end up paying for them in some way. It’ll be good to see how the audience takes to it because it could go a number of ways from here.’

Is this the end for Kerry? Or will she pull through? It’s not been confirmed yet whether Kerry is leaving Emmerdale, so fans will just have to stay tuned to find out!

Emmerdale is next on ITV at 7pm tonight.

description: Kerry Wyatt and Amy Wyatt have found themselves in a difficult situation in Emmerdale recently and things are about to get much worse.
